text:
Gold Card and Platinum Card.
I can compare interest rates, annual fees, cashback or bonus points. What are you interested in?

text:

Platinum Card has a $50 annual fee starting in year 1.
Would you like to compare any more card features?

text:
Gold Card - 
    Interest Rate: 10% APR in year 1 and then increases to 20% APR in year 2. 
    Annual Fee: $15 annual fee for year 1 and then increases to $80 in year 2. 
    Cashback Rate: 1%. 
    Bonus Points: 75,000. 

Platinum Card - 
    Interest Rate: 10% APR in year 1 and then increases to 20% APR in year 2. 
    Annual Fee: $50 annual fee starting in year 1. 
    Cashback Rate: 1%. 
    Bonus Points: 10,000.
Would you like to compare any more card features?
